Name: Ballads and Romances
About the game: The year is 1822. Adam Mickiewicz is preparing to publish his literary debut. In a moment, the world will know his groundbreaking Ballads & romances. Go with the poet on a journey through his memories and find out what contributed to the creation of such ballads as Świteź, Primrose, or Romanticism. During the game, you will learn interesting facts from the life of Adam Mickiewicz, and you will experience events together with the poet, the echoes of which live in his works! The game is available in Polish and English, as well as in color and black and white.
